content.question: ​The average rate of change of the quadratic function <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> is <math alttext="negative 4"><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></math> on the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than x less or equal than 2"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn></math> and <math alttext="negative 1"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math> on the interval <math alttext="2 less or equal than x less or equal than 4"><mn>2</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></math>. What is the average rate of change of <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> on the interval <math alttext="6 less or equal than x less or equal than 8"><mn>6</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></math> ?

choices.label: ​The average rate of change on the interval <math alttext="6 less or equal than x less or equal than 8"><mn>6</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></math> cannot be determined from the information given.

topic.text: 1.3: Rates of Change in Linear and Quadratic Functions

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
